subject: Fines (Penalties)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. issued 21 fines and suspensions worth over $602,000 in November, which matched the total from the first full calendar month of the previous three seasons combined.
snippet: The N.B.A. issued 21 fines and suspensions worth over $602,000 in November, which matched the total from the first full calendar month of the previous three seasons combined.
